01. Accounts.question: Can I share my account?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to share your account with anybody.

01. Accounts.question: Can I give my friend my account?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to share your account with anybody.

01. Accounts.question: Can someone play from my account?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to share your account with anybody.

01. Accounts.question: Can I create another account?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to create multiple different accounts and play from them. You may only play from one account.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to create multiple different accounts and play from them. You may only play from one account.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to create multiple different accounts and play from them. You may only play from one account.

01. Accounts.question: Can my name contain numbers or numbers?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: How should my name look like?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: What are the rules for naming my account?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: How can I capitalise my name?
01. Accounts.answer: Names must be correctly capitalised. The first name and last name must start with a capital letter, then followed by lower case letters. Compound names like McDonald must correctly capitalised as well.

01. Accounts.question: What is correct capitalisation?
01. Accounts.answer: Names must be correctly capitalised. The first name and last name must start with a capital letter, then followed by lower case letters. Compound names like McDonald must correctly capitalised as well.

01. Accounts.question: Can I use symbols in my name?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: Can my name be after a famous person or a celebrity?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: Can I name my account X?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use names containing numerals, incorrect capitalization, symbols, names of infamous or celebrity individuals or unrealistic names.

01. Accounts.question: Can I use mule accounts?
01. Accounts.answer: It is disallowed to use mule accounts for hoarding precious items (such as exclusive vehicles, drugs, or other items alike).

02. Use of chat.question: Can I spam in chat?
02. Use of chat.answer: It is disallowed to send spam messages (messages without any meaning or repeating same message multiple times).

03. Behavior.question: Can I disrespect someone?
03. Behavior.answer: All players must act with respect and be considerate towards others.

04. Abuse of bugs and exploits, misuse o.question: Can I abuse a bug?
04. Abuse of bugs and exploits, misuse o.answer: It is disallowed to make use of any game bugs, or server exploits for advantage.

05. Use of hacks or advantageous mods.question: Can I use a mod?
05. Use of hacks or advantageous mods.answer: It depends on the mod. If it gives you an advantage over other players, it is not allowed.

05. Use of hacks or advantageous mods.answer: No, aimbot is a hack and its usage is not allowed.

06. Common sense.question: Can I act like a retard?
06. Common sense.answer: Players must utilize common sense at all times.

07. Administrator's decisions.question: Can I defy an administrator decision?
07. Administrator's decisions.answer: Players must abide by the decisions made by server administrators.

08. Punishment evasion.question: Can I quit to avoid a punishment?
08. Punishment evasion.answer: It is disallowed to evade a punishment in any way, such as quitting the game when you are about to be issued a punishment.

09. Trade or sale of game items or accou.question: Can I trade or sell my account?
09. Trade or sale of game items or accou.answer: It is disallowed to trade game items or accounts for real money.

10. Reports.question: Can I make an invalid report?
10. Reports.answer: It is disallowed to report players when knowing that the player did not violate the server rules.

11. FAQ.question: How to make money?
11. FAQ.answer: You can make money easily by doing jobs, such as trucking, fishing, mining, etc. You can also make money by selling drugs, or by robbing stores or the bank.

11. FAQ.question: How to get a job?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a job by visiting a Job Point such as the Fire Department and going to the locker room and going on duty via walking onto the Icon. (Note: Some jobs require you to be a certain level or pass an exam to get the job)

11. FAQ.question: How to get a driver's license?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a driver's license by visiting the DMV and getting inside of one of the White Vehicles parked outside and you will be able to start the Exam. (Note: You must have a Passport to take the exam)

11. FAQ.question: How to get a weapon license?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a weapon license by visiting a City Hall and type `/cityhall` and you will be able to view the exam. (Note: You must level 3-4+ and you must have a Passport to take the exam)

11. FAQ.question: How to buy guns?
11. FAQ.answer: You can buy guns by visiting a Gun Store and type `/buy` and you will be able to view the guns. (Note: You must have a Weapon License to buy guns)

11. FAQ.question: How to buy a house?
11. FAQ.answer:
Houses are scattered around the map and you can buy them by visiting the house and type `/purchase` and you will be able to view the house.
 You can also buy houses from People and they cannot scam you since it is against the rules! (Note: Green House Icon = Not Owned, Red House Icon = Owned, Yellow House Icon = Group Owned)

11. FAQ.question: How to buy a business?
11. FAQ.answer:
Businesses are scattered around the map and you can buy them by visiting the business and type `/purchase` and you will be able to view the business.
 You can also buy businesses from People and they cannot scam you since it is against the rules! (Note: Green Business Icon = Not Owned, Red Business Icon = Owned, Yellow Business Icon = Group Owned)

11. FAQ.question: How to buy a vehicle?
11. FAQ.answer:
You can buy vehicles by visiting a Vehicle Dealership and type `/browse` and you will be able to view the vehicles.
 You can also buy vehicles from People and Dealership Groups! (Note: You can be scammed if you do not use /transfervehicle, so be careful!)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be police?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be police by visiting a Police Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Badge Icon. (Note: You must be level 3-4+ to be police with a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be a firefighter?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be a firefighter by visiting a Fire Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Fire Extinguisher Icon. (Note: You must have a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be a medic?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be a medic by visiting a Hospital and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Heart Icon. (Note: You must have a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be ems?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be a medic by visiting a Hospital and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Heart Icon. (Note: You must have a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I join safd?
11. FAQ.answer: You can join SAFD by visiting a Fire Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Fire Extinguisher Icon. (Note: You must have a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I join sapd?
11. FAQ.answer: You can join SAPD by visiting a Police Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Badge Icon. (Note: You must be level 3-4+ to be police with a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be officer?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be a police officer by visiting a Police Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Badge Icon. (Note: You must be level 3-4+ to be police with a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How can I be a cop?
11. FAQ.answer: You can be a police officer by visiting a Police Department and taking the exam by walking into the icon, after passing you can go to the locker room and go on duty by walking into the Badge Icon. (Note: You must be level 3-4+ to be police with a Valid Passport, Driver's License, and Weapon License)

11. FAQ.question: How to play?
11. FAQ.answer: There are alot of things to do in the server, you can do jobs, rob stores, rob banks, sell drugs, buy houses, buy businesses, buy vehicles, and much more! (Note: Use /support and ask for a Helper to guide you if you need more help!)

11. FAQ.question: How to get a passport?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a passport by visiting a City Hall and type `/cityhall` and you will be able to view the exam. (Note: You must be level 2+ to get a passport)

11. FAQ.question: How to get a phone?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a phone by visiting a 24/7 and type `/buy` and select `Phone` and buy it.

11. FAQ.question: How to get a radio?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a radio by visiting a 24/7 and type `/buy` and select `Radio` and buy it.

11. FAQ.question: How to get a walkietalkie?
11. FAQ.answer: You can get a walkietalkie by visiting a 24/7 and type `/buy` and select `WalkieTalkie` and buy it.

11. FAQ.question: How to refuel on mobile?
11. FAQ.answer: You can refuel on mobile by typing `/refuel` and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to put gas in car on mobile?
11. FAQ.answer: You can put gas in car on mobile by typing `/refuel` and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to fill car on mobile?
11. FAQ.answer: You can fill car on mobile by typing `/refuel` and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to refuel on pc?
11. FAQ.answer: You can refuel on pc by pressing the `Break` Button and holding it and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to put gas in car on pc?
11. FAQ.answer: You can put gas in car on pc by pressing the `Break` Button and holding it and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to fill car on pc?
11. FAQ.answer: You can fill car on pc by pressing the `Break` Button and holding it and you will be able to refuel.

11. FAQ.question: How to take screenshots?
11. FAQ.answer: You can take screenshots by pressing `F8` and the screenshots will be saved in your GTA San Andreas User Files.

11. FAQ.question: How to report a player?
11. FAQ.answer: You can report a player by typing `/report (ID) (Reason)` and you will be able to report a player.

11. FAQ.question: How to report a bug?
11. FAQ.answer: You can report a bug by going [here](https://forum.valrisegaming.com/index.php?/forms/21-samp-rp-bug-report/).

11. FAQ.question: How to report a cheater?
11. FAQ.answer: You can report a cheater by typing `/report` but mainly you should open a Ticket on our Discord or open a Forum Report [here](https://forum.valrisegaming.com/index.php?/forms/4-samp-rp-report-players/).

11. FAQ.question: How to report a hacker?
11. FAQ.answer: You can report a hacker by typing `/report` but mainly you should open a Ticket on our Discord or open a Forum Report [here](https://forum.valrisegaming.com/index.php?/forms/4-samp-rp-report-players/).

11. FAQ.question: How to use case?
11. FAQ.answer: You can use case by typing `/use (weapon) case` and you will be able to use case.

11. FAQ.question: How to use weapon case?
11. FAQ.answer: You can use weapon case by typing `/use (weapon) case` and you will be able to use weapon case.

11. FAQ.question: How to cook Heroin?
11. FAQ.answer:
You can start cooking Heroin by going to a Heroin Shack or a Drug Lab and typing `/heroin make` and it will start the Heroin Making Process.
After abit, it will ask you to add either (Water, Calcium, Sodium or Acetone), to add them on PC press and hold the `SHIFT/Sprint` Button. (Note: if you are on Mobile then type `/heroin add` and it will add the item.)
After adding the item, it will ask you to add another item, keep adding items until it says `Heroin is ready!` and then type `/heroin collect` and you will be able to collect the Heroin. (Note: Sometimes your heroin will go Bad from either you not adding enough items or you adding too much items, if it goes bad then you will have to start over.)

11. FAQ.question: How to cook Meth?
11. FAQ.answer:
You can start cooking Meth by using /getin inside of a journey and typing `/meth make` and it will start the Meth Making Process.
After abit, it will ask you to add either (Water, Calcium, Sodium or Acetone), to add them on PC press and hold the `SHIFT/Sprint` Button. (Note: if you are on Mobile then type `/meth add` and it will add the item.)
After adding the item, it will ask you to add another item, keep adding items until it says `Meth is ready!` and then type `/meth collect` and you will be able to collect the Meth. (Note: Sometimes you might explode from either you not adding enough items or you adding too much items, if you explode then you will have to start over.)

11. FAQ.question: How to cook Cocaine?
11. FAQ.answer:
You can start cooking Cocaine by going to a Drug Lab and typing `/cocaine make` and it will start the Cocaine Making Process.
After abit, it will ask you to add either (Water, Calcium, Sodium or Acetone), to add them on PC press and hold the `SHIFT/Sprint` Button. (Note: if you are on Mobile then type `/cocaine add` and it will add the item.)
After adding the item, it will ask you to add another item, keep adding items until it says `Cocaine is ready!` and then type `/cocaine collect` and you will be able to collect the Cocaine. (Note: Sometimes your Cocaine will go Bad from either you not adding enough items or you adding too much items, if it goes bad then you will have to start over.)

11. FAQ.question: How to plant weed?
11. FAQ.answer:
You can plant Weed in different ways, Pot Houses give you Sativa whilst outside gives you Indica.
**Pot House:** You can plant weed in Pot Houses by going inside then walking up to a pot and using `/weed plant`. Make sure you have Weed Seeds in your inventory. (You can buy Weed Seeds at the Seeds Stores, Some stores might not have weed seeds so keep searching!)
**Outside:** You can plant weed outside by going to a Weed Field and typing `/weed plant`. Make sure you have Weed Seeds in your inventory. (You can buy Weed Seeds at the Seeds Stores, Some stores might not have weed seeds so keep searching!)

11. FAQ.question: How to harvest weed?
11. FAQ.answer: You have to walk up to a plant and use `/weed harvest` and you will be able to harvest the weed.

11. FAQ.question: How to sell drugs?
11. FAQ.answer: You can sell drugs by going to a Drug Dealer and typing `/dealer` and selecting the things you want to sell. (Note: You can also sell drugs to players but you have a chance to be scammed, so be careful!)

11. FAQ.question: How to sell weed?
11. FAQ.answer: You can sell weed by going to a Drug Dealer and typing `/dealer` and selecting either `Sativa` or `Indica`. (Note: You can also sell weed to players but you have a chance to be scammed, so be careful!)

11. FAQ.question: How to sell heroin?
11. FAQ.answer: You can sell heroin by going to a Drug Dealer and typing `/dealer` and selecting `Heroin`. (Note: You can also sell heroin to players but you have a chance to be scammed, so be careful!)

11. FAQ.question: How to sell meth?
11. FAQ.answer: You can sell meth by going to a Drug Dealer and typing `/dealer` and selecting `Meth`. (Note: You can also sell meth to players but you have a chance to be scammed, so be careful!)

11. FAQ.question: How to sell cocaine?
11. FAQ.answer: You can sell cocaine by going to a Drug Dealer and typing `/dealer` and selecting `Cocaine`. (Note: You can also sell cocaine to players but you have a chance to be scammed, so be careful!)
